title: High prevalence of carbapenem-resistant Enterobacterales (CRE) in human samples from Nigeria: A systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Ahmad Adebayo Irekeola, Rafidah Hanim Shueb, Engku Nur Syafirah Engku Abd Rahman, Hafeez Abiola Afolabi, Yusuf Wada, Abdirahman Hussein Elmi, Muath Abdu Hakami, Sfeeah Mofareah Alghzwani, Osman AE. Elnoubi, Ahmad A. Alshehri
